DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether anal fistula plug or endorectal advancement flap is more successful in the treatment of anal fistulas and compared both procedures with regards to cost.
DOC.brief_title: Anal Fistula Plug Versus Endorectal Advancement Flap
DOC.detailed_description: A detailed analysis will be performed to determine independent predicting factors of recurrence and of higher costs.
DOC.criteria: Adults (18 years of age or more) Single anal fistula Surgically treated with anal fistula plug or endorectal advancement flap Children or adolescents Pregnancy Patients treated with setons alone
